DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ENERGY
DOC.TEXT: Unocal to Begin Phase 2 of Gas Field : The company said it will spend $ 423 million to develop the second phase of the Jakrawan natural_gas field in the Gulf of Thailand . In a news release , Unocal Corp . said the second phase is designed to boost total production of its Unocal Thailand Ltd . unit to more_than 850 million cubic_feet of gas a day , starting in the last_quarter of 1996 . It said the total field is estimated to hold about 600 billion cubic_feet of gas and more_than 11 million barrels of condensate .
